item.title: Interships Proposals on IonSat Projects
item.author: antoine.tavant@polytechnique.edu (Antoine Tavant)
item.description: Join the IonSat project ! Ionsat is a 6U nanosatellite equipped with an electric propulsion engine, dedicated to demonstrating the feasibility of nanosatellite missions in very low orbit (250km).
